contentrichtext.text: '''USE''' or '''U.S.E.''' can refer to: * [[United States of Europe]], a term sometimes used to refer to a hypothetical [[Federal Europe]] * The fictional United States of Europe in the alternate history novel [[1632 (novel)|''1632'']] and the following [[1632 series|1632 book series]] * [[United State of Electronica]], an American rock band ** [[U.S.E. (album)|''U.S.E.'' (album)]], a self-titled album by the band * [[Uganda Securities Exchange]], the principal stock exchange in Uganda * [[Uzbekistan Stock Exchange]] ==See also== * [[Use (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}}
